description: Can set states on all nodes and points which lay on the same level.

children.name: hover
children.description: Options for the hovered point. These settings override the normal state options when a point is moused over or touched.

children.name: inactive
children.description: The opposite state of a hover for a single point node/link.

children.name: normal
children.description: The normal state of a series, or for point items in column, pie and similar series. Currently only used for setting animation when returning to normal state from hover.

children.name: select
children.description: Options for the selected point. These settings override the normal state options when a point is selected.
